name: Starlight
title: starlight.astro.build
payoff: Build docs sites with Astro easily
shortDescription: Starlight is a documentation site builder powered by Astro, designed to enhance the way developers create and manage their documentation. It supports various markup languages like Markdown, Markdoc, and MDX, and integrates seamlessly with TypeScript for type-safety. Users can extend Starlight with their preferred UI components from frameworks like React, Vue, and more. It's ideal for developers looking to streamline documentation processes without compromising on design or functionality.
cons: Limited by the extensibility of the underlying framework
Potential learning curve for non-technical users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Docusaurus
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar site building with React
